<<<<<<< HEAD
Some weighty considerations humbly proposed to the honourable members of the ensuing assembly of the states of Scotland. By a lover of his countreys liberty. Lover of his countrey's liberty.
8 p.
Re-printed [by the heir of A. Anderson?], [Edinburgh] : in the year, 1689.
Place of publication and suggested printer from Wing. Title page is cropped at head, slightly affecting title. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
